DEBBIE ROSE T. BANAG Blk 5 Lot 13 Sec 30 Ph 3 Bahay Katuparan, Brgy. Bagtas, Tanza, Cavite 0935-812-2027 debbiebanag@gmail.com
OBJECTIVE
Determined and motivated to continue and achieve career goals with the academe, be a good citizen and eager to contribute to the educational development of society and achievement of the university’s mission, vision and objectives effectively and efficiently.
EXPERIENCES
 Instructor (Contractual), July 2016-December 2016, Cavite State University, Tanza, Cavite o Instructor I, taught management and marketing courses to business management students and other courses to other programs offered by the university o Adviser of management and marketing students’ researches and student organization o Established teamwork among students to produce quality school papers o Conduct extension programs specifically livelihood training to help the community.  Instructor (Part-time), June 2012- April 2016, Cavite State University, Tanza, Cavite. o Instructor I, taught management and marketing courses to business management students and other courses to other programs offered by the university o Coordinated external and business affairs to provide the needs of the students and university o Researcher and adviser for management and marketing students’ researches and student organization o Established teamwork among students to produce quality school papers  Trainee, April-May 2011, Mutual Savings and Credit Cooperative of the Philippines, Tanza, Cavite.
EDUCATION
 Master in Business Administration, March 2016, Lyceum of the Philippines University, Gen. Trias, Cavite.  Bachelor of Science in Business Management major in Marketing Management with Certificate in Information Systems Management, April 2012, Cavite State University, Tanza, Cavite.  Maungib High School, March 2008, Pura, Tarlac.  Pura Community School, March 2004, Pura, Tarlac. SEMINARS/TRAININGS  Business Analytics, Series 1: Fundamentals of Business Analytics and Series 2: Descriptive Analytics, September 14-16, 2016, Hotel Dominique, Tagaytay City, Cavite.  2-day Teacher Training on English Proficiency: A Gabay Guro Project, June 3-4, 2016, Cavite State University, Trece Martires City Cavite.  T3 In-house Research and Development Review, March 21, 2016, Cavite State University, Indang, Cavite  Seminar-Workshop on Gender and Development and its Integration to Outcomes- Based Education (OBE) Course Syllabi, February 1-2, 2016, Cavite State University, Indang, Cavite.

SKILLS and ABILITIES
 Ability to use Microsoft Office applications such as Word, Excel and PowerPoint.  Efficiently manage time to coordinate and accomplish the duties and responsibilities given.  Communicate effectively through listening to the needs of the students/clients and respond promptly when needed.  Ability to use effective techniques for classroom discussions and activities.  Accomplishes tasks given with minimal direction and supervision.  Established collaboration in doing students’ researches in the field of management and marketing by giving advices for the improvement of the paper.  Employ work ethics and respect to people in the workplace to build trust and confidence.  Able to set priorities and accept new ideas for continuous improvement.  Value professionalism in the workplace, willing to accept responsibility and accountability. AFFILIATION/ORGANIZATION  Member, September 2016-present, Council of Deans and Educators of Business, Region IV- A.
CERTIFICATION
 Certificate of Eligibility, 2012, Civil Service Commission.
